content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ home services. I see you might need help with your HVAC system. May I have your name to get started?
Thanks, George! Can you please provide the address where you'd like us to service your HVAC system?
Great, George! Let me confirm if we can service your area...
We do service your area. When would be an ideal time for us to schedule the service?
Honestly, I'm swamped this month. Too busy to schedule anything right now.
I understand, George. If you'd like, I can check availability for next month or assist you later when your schedule frees up. Would you prefer that?
No thanks. Iâ€™ll reach out when I have time. Appreciate it though.
reason: Customer too busy to schedule appointment

content: Thanks for letting us know, George. Feel free to reach out anytime you need assistance with your HVAC. Have a great day!
